waiting_for: SETUP SIGNIFICANTLY IMPROVED - PRICE SURGED INTO ENTRY ZONE: Price rallied +66.00 points (25415.50 to 25481.50), moving dramatically closer to LONG entry zone. long_assessment.reasoning: SETUP SIGNIFICANTLY IMPROVED - STRONG MOMENTUM SURGE (Age: 5 bars): Price exploded +66.00 points this bar, closing at 25481.50 and dramatically reducing distance to entry zone from 93.75 to just 27.75 points. The +66 point surge validates our patience - price is now positioned for final push into entry zone. CONFIDENCE INCREASED from 0.68 to 0.82 due to strong momentum confirmation and proximity to entry. CONTINUING TO WAIT for price to reach 25512.00 entry level - we're very close now. This is a high-quality setup developing exactly as anticipated. Next bar could trigger entry if momentum continues.
